Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The present case suggests that obesity , hyperinsulinemia , insulin resistance , and long - term treatment with VPA may be all associated with the development of NAFLD ; this side effect is reversible after VPA withdrawal .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Obesity |
| Hyperinsulinemia |
| Insulin resistance |
| Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Obesity |
| Hyperinsulinemia |
| Insulin resistance |
| Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD) |

Note: In this context, "side effect" is an indication of a disease or condition, so it is included implicitly in "this side effect is reversible after VPA withdrawal" and does not need to be explicitly listed.

Obesity is not a chemical entity, it is a medical condition.
